Summary: Ball of light with flat bottom - bright orange
divs: Sighting Detailshanging out in driveway with friends and family- mostly talking, someone pointed it out and we all took one look and quickly determined it was not a conventional craft -- eerie to say the least. We tracked it moving at a steady pace maybe 600' off the ground heading in the direction of the fireworks. 6-7 witnesses. Viewed it thru my bushnell 4x30 binoculars. Appeared to be a bright orange light with a flat bottom. Flew from eat to west. Eventually got behind trees and lost sight of it.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Sioux City
There were no other sightings in Sioux City on or around June 30th 2012
